title: New Zealand v England: second men’s cricket one-day international – live
summary: In Hamilton, New Zealand and England are competing in the second one-day international match. Writers are providing live updates and commentary on the game as it unfolds. Fans can follow along for detailed coverage of the match progress.

title: Hundreds of hospice beds and staff cut in England  amid funding crisis
summary: The National Audit Office reports that nearly two-thirds of independent hospices are operating at a deficit for the 2023-24 fiscal year. This financial strain is attributed to rising demand for hospice services. The situation highlights the growing challenges faced by these care providers amidst increasing pressure on the healthcare system.

title: How a radical experiment to bring a forest into a preschool transformed children’s health
summary: In Finland, kindergartens are increasing children's exposure to mud, wild plants, and moss to promote health and well-being. This initiative highlights the importance of biodiversity in early development. Educators are observing positive changes in children's health as a result of these nature-based activities.
